content: Television channel **Vannathirai** (VTV) is a 24-hour [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language) [movie channel](/wiki/Movie_channel) that includes live talks with hosts and Singaporean celebrities. Launched on 24 September 2008 and broadcast in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) through [cable television](/wiki/Cable_television), it is suitable for all age groups as it screens [films](/wiki/Film) from the 1960s to the latest releases in 2019. As a popular Tamil media, the channel is known among Singaporeans for broadcasting various classic hit [movies](/wiki/Movie) and [blockbusters](/wiki/Blockbuster_(entertainment)).[*citation needed*] ## Programmes The channel has carried a variety of original productions since its inception. - *Hello V Live* - *Kalyana Mela* - *Neengal Kettavai* - *Start Camera Action* - Facebook page This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Vannathirai
